The documents indicate his involvement in the investigation of CIA activities related to Lee Harvey Oswald and Cuban operations in Mexico City in 1963. The documents do not provide specific details about Hardway's individual contributions to the HSCA investigation, but his presence on the HSCA staff places him in a key position to have accessed and analyzed information related to the JFK assassination.
